name: Made in Hell
description:
■
"Made in Hell" is a 2D pixel vertical scrolling action game.
Throw bones and jump (warp).
Throw a bone and keep climbing.

■
In "Made in Hell", you can use the mouse to determine the direction in which to throw bones.
When you throw a bone, it hits a wall and flies away.
When the bone touches the floor floating in the air, it stops moving and you can warp to that floor.
It is a game that repeats this and continues to climb aiming for the top.

■
mouse and keyboard support
(Not compatible with controllers)

■
Strategy tips
・Bones move according to virtual laws of physics. (free fall, reflection, etc.)
- You can see the trajectory of throwing bones with transparent bones. Let's check the trajectory of the throw by looking at this bone.
・There are many objects that disturb the player.
"Depending on the location, using objects may be advantageous."
・If the bone goes over the wall surrounding the stage (if it goes outside the stage), you will be forced to respawn at the position where you threw the bone.

■
Game distribution (live distribution)
It's okay to do game distribution (live distribution).
No need to contact me.
It's okay to monetize.
